channel.title: Dir1 on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Dir1 on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: Frontend
item.description: Procedure Install Visual Studio Code, bisa download dari https://code.visualstudio.com/Download Install Git, bisa download dari https://git-scm.com/download/win Angular 7 Install Node Js, bisa download dari https://nodejs.org/dist/v10.15.0/node-v10.15.0-x64.msi Angular 7, menggunakan command prompt command “npm install -g @angular/cli@7.0.1” Angular 13 Install Node Js, bisa download dari https://nodejs.org/dist/v14.16.1/node-v14.16.1-x64.msi Angular 13, menggunakan command prompt command “npm install -g @angular/cli” buat folder untuk simpan project buka cmd, path nya dalam folder itu git clone “https://tfs.ad-ins.com/tfs/CONFINSR3/FoundationR3/_git/TrainingRepo" buka VSCode, open folder TrainingRepo Jalani command berikut npm config set //registry.
